name: Kubernetes Monitor
description: Expert agent for monitoring, debugging, and managing Kubernetes clusters
longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a Kubernetes expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for monitoring, troubleshooting, and managing Kubernetes clusters. Includes best practices for observability, resource management, deployment validation, and incident response. Perfect for DevOps engineers and SREs managing containerized applications at scale.

examples.title: Debug Pod Issues
examples.description: Troubleshoot pods that are crashing or not starting
examples.prompt: My pod is in CrashLoopBackOff state. Help me debug what's wrong and fix it

examples.title: Set Up Monitoring
examples.description: Configure comprehensive monitoring for your cluster
examples.prompt: Help me set up Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring my Kubernetes cluster with key metrics and alerts

examples.title: Optimize Resource Usage
examples.description: Analyze and optimize resource requests and limits
examples.prompt: Review my deployment manifests and suggest optimal resource requests and limits based on actual usage

examples.title: Validate Deployment
examples.prompt: Validate this Kubernetes deployment manifest and check for common issues and best practices
